msbt.message: Feeling that Festivale beat yet? Once it hits you, there's no stopping it!You just gotta go with it. Don't worry about looking silly. Get out there and cut loose, !
Bet you can't catch more feathers than me.<10_4 /> Actually, I bet you can. But I wanna see how bad I get trounced.So yeah, if you spot a feather, whip out that net and go wild! Bwa ha ha!
Know what's frustrating? Seeing the feather you're after sail right on by. I didn't get my net out in time. Ugh!Oh, hey! I bet we could trade later. Come find me if you end up with any spare .
Way to sparkle it up! I'm loving that Festivale vibe. You're making me wanna dance even harder!
You know Festivale's gotta be rad when even I wanna dress up for it. I look so cool in this, .
You gotta check out the moves on Pav√©. He is FEELING it, and it's really amazing to watch, .
There's dancing, and then there's DANCING. Festivale's totally about the louder one, .
The feathers falling everywhere look so cool I wonder what it'd take to get a rainbow feather, .
Don't be afraid to bust out your best move in front of folks. It's Festivale! Nobody's judging, !
I decided to go all out and rock the pro-dancer look for Festivale.I figure you gotta look like you mean it if you wanna be able to dance like you mean it, !
Festivale is on! I hope you slept well and had your coffee, 'cause this party ain't stoppin' till dawn!
This party's only just getting warmed up. If you feel tired, go shake it off and get back on the dance floor!
Hold up, what time is it? Bwa ha ha! I didn't even notice the sun went down, !Well, this party's not going anywhere anytime soon, so neither am I!
How's Festivale going out there? It sounds like everyone's having a blast, !
Don't mind me. I'm just chilling for a bit before I head back out there. You can join me if you want.
It's so rad going outside and having confetti falling all around you.It's almost like a big, huge parade's coming through .

Are you any good at dancing? I'm not, but I try to not let that stop meno matter how much my buddies beg.But it's Festivale! Today's all about making a fool of yourself out there, so I'm gonna own it, !
Doing Festivale right means feeling that beat and dancing all through the night. There's just no other way.
This Festivale's not missing a beat. Even the weather's supposed to rock today, !
I think I Festivaled a bit too hard out there. I'm exhausted! I had a blast, but I should've paced myself better.
I really oughta get back out there. How many other chances am I gonna get to dance till dawn, ?
Hey, whoa! Do you really have there?I've been looking everywhere for those! Could I get you to trade for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, no.
Hold up a sec! You've got on you.Alright, this is a long shot, but could I convince you to trade for my ?
Sure!
Sorry, no.
Sweet! I knew I could count on you.
Nice! OK, let's do this quick before you change your mind!
You rock! I mean, it's Festivale, so today everybody rocks, butYou rock extra hard, !
Thanks! You don't know how hard I've been trying to find these. It was getting real annoying, .
Aw, slugs Sorry I got all up in your face about it, .
Oh. I guess I should've seen that coming. It's fine. Don't worry about it, .
Oh! You'd be cool with trading of your for of my ?
Let's do it!
Wait, no.
